review: I can sum it up quickly.  I love it.
author: prewby

review: Still learning how to use the various apps.Easy installation.... Versatile and well worth the money.\I am happy to cut the cord!!!!
author: Proverb 31

review: Worms great! All that you need is in this little stick
author: Kah Wah Cheong

review: The Fire Stick is a great way to stream video.  We used it in our mountain place with no problems.
author: Douglas B. Chappell

review: Very easy to setup. Easy to navigate but with just a few spots you have to get used to.  Everybody should try this.
author: Robert Edwards

review: I got it mainly for Amazon prime videos, youtube and Pandora. I haven't had a chance to explore other apps yet but so far I like the device. It's small and attaches to the TV via the usb port. Not bad for the price.
author: Mom of Twins

review: Get Chrome Cast if you don't have to use Prime.
author: r to the ia

review: We are loving our Amazon Fire Stick!  It is quick to follow commands, has a wide variet of apps for both the adults and children in our household. My youngest son especially loves the Disney App.  I like how easy it is to use. We like playing games and watching all the great content available. In fact I have purchased 2 so that my kids can watch something on their TV while we use ours!
author: Christy S.
